column1: Determine if you had to choose an auto insurance provider based on these ratings, which one you would opt for. Explain your answer.
I would choose Progressive because while they do not have the highest rating in the data, they have more consistent ratings than the other two companies.
None of Progressive's ratings go below 5.0, and the sum of all of their ratings is higher than the other two companies.
They also have the highest average rating.
